kpi_info.title: E-DCH SERVING CELL CHANGES STARTED
kpi_info.use: The number of E-DCH serving cell change attempts. When handover control initiates HS-DSCH serving cell change procedure for a UE with E-DCH uplink and the new serving cell candidate has got E-DCH allocated, thus making it possible to stay in E-DCH.If none of the new HS-DSCH serving cell candidates have E-DCH allocated, thus forcing uplink downgrade from E-DCH to DCH, this counter is not updated because E-DCH serving cell change is not even attempted but downgrade is inevitable.This counter is updated for the old serving E-DCH cell before the procedure.
